file_content.text: We owe you everything! Please, tell the major at Cresh Outpost that we will begin building defenses. He won't have to worry about us.
I don't care about the bomb or the Empire. I'm staying here. It's my life's work, and... I have nowhere else to go.
The Empire won't take my station again. I swear to it.
Thank you! Thank you! We will never be able to repay you for your kindness and bravery!
You've inspired us! We won't let our work fall into the wrong hands again! We're going to fight back!
Please, tell Cresh Outpost that we'll begin building a defense system to protect the station. If the Empire comes back, we'll be ready.
I'm sure Major Vinson will be glad to hear it.
They're probably waiting to hear from me now. I'd better get moving.
